metadata.name: E-STELLAR
metadata.description:
'E-Stellar' - Scars and Stars 
This is a limited edition of 600, my very first edition series.

Reflecting on the rundown of this year 2022, There were a lot of ups and downs, "E-Stellar" captures a moment in between fear and hope.  
As Human we are connected to our emotions based on relationships, ethnicity, our wins, failures and a lot more. Though most leaves SCARS we can always find the STARS in them.


Every Collector from this artwork will have the opportunity of receiving a free airdrop of a new artwork in this series.
